mapper.select: select p.place_idx as placeIdx, p.title as title, p.subject_category as subjectCategory, pf.file_name as fileName, p.new_address as newAddress, h.tag as hashtags, ps.member_idx as scrapIdx from hgs.places as p left join hgs.place_hashtags as ph on p.place_idx = ph.place_idx left join hgs.hashtags as h on h.hashtag_idx = ph.hashtag_idx left join hgs.place_replys as pr on pr.place_idx = p.place_idx left join hgs.place_scraps as ps on ps.place_idx = p.place_idx left join hgs.place_files as pf on pf.place_idx = p.place_idx where h.tag like concat("%",#{param1},"%") or p.title like concat("%",#{param1},"%") or p.new_address like concat("%",#{param1},"%") or p.place_idx = #{param2} order by RAND() limit 10;

select place_idx, title, subject_category,new_address from hgs.places where new_address like CONCAT ('%', (select substring_index(address," ", 1) from hgs.members where member_idx = ${param1}), '%') order by RAND() limit 7;
